name: The Survivor(Graveyard)
description:
Thank you for playing this game.

Prototype for a zombie survival game, 

This game is heavy. It probably won't work without a graphics card.

(tested on a laptop : i7-11400H, Mem16GB, RTX3050, SSD512GB.)

Run "Prototype.exe" to play the game.

(All other maps are included. [Prototype: Evil Village & Dark Cave])

-----Controls-----

W/A/S/D Key:  Move

Mouse Left Click:  Shoot

Mouse Right Click:  Push Aside

Mouse Scroll Wheel:  Switch Weapon

R Key:  Reload

Space Key:  Jump

Esc key:  Show Mouse Cursor

Pause key:  Pause

--------------------

(Unity 2021.3.15)

(The file is compressed in 7zip. 

 You will need 7Zip software to decompress the file.

 Please download the software from "MicrosoftStore" or other sources.)
